Reviews.Title: Very Nice Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Renee McClennon "book worm"
Reviews.Content: I have an old Gateway tablet that I love but with usage I burned out the light for the monitor.  I received this laptop last week on Friday and thus far I really like it.  I would like to upgrade to 8GB of RAM but not sure if it is upgradable.  The only thing I don't like thus far is the sound system.  Its a bit weak but overall great computer for the price and Windows 7 Home edition reminds me of Vista Home edition just with upgrades but I'm super happy to buy this product brand new with Windows 7 and not have to worry about the Windows 8 horror stories.  I'll post again after a month or so but I highly recommend this laptop for work, download, watching videos, everyday basic usage etc.Oh I forgot I love this 17inch monitor.  Not sure why anyone would want to do work on a tablet (killing the eyes) but the monitor is great and the laptop is surprisingly light.

Reviews.Title: Well Worth The Price
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: excellent laptop with great software and very easy setup.  The is my 3rd Gateway and I think they are as good as any on the market  Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Model NV76R45U laptop
Reviews.Author: R. Boffo
Reviews.Content: I am seventy years old and went from a desktop with Windows XP to this Gateway NV7645U.  Bought it from a local desaler that has been in business forty years.  They have there own tech people.  I find this laptop to be very functional, true it was a bit of a challenge for me at XP so long.  I have had this laptop for two weeks now and use it extensively several hours a day.  I feel very comfortable  using it n ow after getting use to it.  It is three times faster than my desktop I had.  I would recommend this laptop toanyone needing a very good laptop.  Robert

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Mary P. Redrick "johnny bill"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new laptop!  Everything has been great about it.  It is meeting my needs perfectly.

Reviews.Title: So Disappointing
Reviews.Author: CJ M "CJ"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer after looking at all the online reviews I could find. I've had good experiences with Gateway before, and I was drawn to everything this one came with (most notably, Windows 7; I have a deep loathing for 8).I received my laptop on Jan 8th, and everything was running smoothly. Unfortunately, starting the second day, my computer started freezing during Windows updates. By the fourth day, it was freezing when trying to wake from sleep mode. Today (day six), my trackpad quit responding; I had to use an external mouse. Rebooting didn't work, and everything was marked enabled.That was just one too many issues for me in less than a week of owning. I know not many others have complained of issues, so it might have just been this one unit, but I'm not taking that chance. I'm a college student who largely takes online classes, and I need a reliable computer. I'm returning this one, and getting a Toshiba instead.

Reviews.Title: I like it, but...
Reviews.Author: whocares
Reviews.Content: This laptop, while aesthetically pleasing, has a couple of issues.  First, and most surprising, is NO BLUETOOTH!  What modern PC does not?The other issue is the OS.  M$ tells me it is pirated.  Whether or not this is true, I shouldn't need to waste my time resolving it.  Gateway insists it isn't, so who is right?The touch pad was disabled with the last M$ update.  My complaint with the touchpad is it is too easily touched while typing.  I find I have to make too many corrections.  So, for the moment, not having a touchpad isn't a big negative.The only other thing is the keyboard seems a little flexible.  I've noticed it flexing while I type.  It hasn't been a problem so far, though.It would have been a better offer with a larger HD.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love this computer!
Reviews.Author: Joey Morales
Reviews.Content: This computer has plenty of speed, it's esthetically a beautiful machine!The size is just what I need and I so prefer windows 7 over windows 8And for the price! . . I feel I scored an amazing deal!!

Reviews.Title: factory settings weren't all there... missing key.components
Reviews.Author: jjkge
Reviews.Content: Drivers missing, definite system issues, web cam doesn't work at all - like it doesn't exist on this computer - called gateway(Acer)  talked to 2 people in India - restarted factory settings again, no change. They suggest taking the hours- old  brand new computer and sending it to repair in Texas - don't like the wait or trouble of that. It's new, it should work! Hopefully  pccrush has a better replacement or return policy. This is frustrating-

Reviews.Title: Great computer so far!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd straight NV series laptop and so far it's been great for the price.  I had my other NV for 4 years straight and no problems with it, but it was starting to overheat and slow the system.  But 4 years with one laptop is great, so I decided to stay with the same brand/model and also, I didn't want windows 8.  Also,  I immediately replaced the 6 gb ram with 8 gb -- Crucial 8GB Kit (4GBx2) DDR3 1600 MT/.  After a few minutes of unscrewing the back, it took less than two minutes to put the additional ram in it.  Having said that, I didn't have it long enough with 6 gb to determine a difference in speed, but having the additional 2 gb can only help when needed. Other than that, I have had no problems with and would recommend it.  Also, for those who have issues with the low sound volume, like me!  Just go to your speakers properties and click the (loudness equalization) and you should hear a noticeable increase in volume.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: susan king
Reviews.Content: The best product i have ever purchsed online!! Everyone should check this out for a laptop!!! the best laptop ever!!

Reviews.Title: The gateway is just OK not great.
Reviews.Author: Nathan McMinn
Reviews.Content: The laptop came with to much blot ware. I spent many hours removing the software. Also, the keyboard is a little soft.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: jlee33
Reviews.Content: The Gateway NV76R45U is slower to load than I anticipated.  Also, I am very disappointed with the audio. I've noticed that I cannot hear some audio in videos even when I have the sound turned all the way up. Another issue is when the numb lock in on the page up and page down buttons will not work. I have to keep switching back and forth and it's annoying.

Reviews.Title: My Dream Computer.....
Reviews.Author: cheetahcat1980
Reviews.Content: This computer is an excellent investment and not too high. It's of a beautiful candy apple red color and also colored once opened on the key board too. I was so happy to find this and with Windows 7 ( I can not stand windows 8!) You simply will adore this laptop so far so good and the craftsmanship is also top notch coming with a protective cotton black keyboard cover and white cotton pouch to hold the lab top after use. Needless to say I am very happy best laptop I've owed yet.

Reviews.Title: Good computer, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Rubin
Reviews.Content: I've been using this computer for a few months now. I generally like it except for a few quirks. It's speed is good. The hard drive fast and adequately large to hold a lot of photos, etc, and the memory enough for some large photo manmipulations. The screen is great, although when watching a movie, one must be perpendicular to the screen to avoid light/dark variations, especially when black appears on the screen. The battery seems excellent, as it has lasted almost 4 hours a couple of times before requiring recharge. There are a few annoying quirks... one of which makes it difficult to reboot the computer as when installing updates, and that is the computer hangs on reboot when Restart is chosen from the Start menu. One must physically shut down the computer, then restart. The keyboard, while mostly responsive, has a few sensitive keys that do not register unless they are hit squarely in the middle of the key. Unfortunately, the Delete key is one of them, and that's a key I use a lot. It seems that I must hit the keys relatively hard to avoid character dropouts. Another drawback of the keyboard is that there are no dedicated Home, End, Page Up, nor Page Down keys. One must use a combination of the Function key and one of the arrow keys to achieve those functions. Again, those are keys I use a lot, but I'm slowly getting used to the new combinations. The special function keys present a nice suite of functions and are quite responsive. All in all, I like this computer and would recommend it especially if you are seeking a laptop with Windows 7, especially for a 17" with a price of $550.

Reviews.Title: Full of strange glitches
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: What I find very frustrating about this computer is that it is very "skittish".  By this I mean that suddenly, for no reason that I can ascertain, it will skip from one area to another, particularly when I am trying to write e-mails.  For example, in just tryiing to write this, the cursor jumps from one place to another.  Web pages will dis.appear all at once for no apparent reason.These "foibles" are so irritating that had I to do it over again, I would not purchase this machine.

Reviews.Title: Good looking case and windows 7
Reviews.Author: Jerry Freeman
Reviews.Content: Great computer if you are looking for windows 7. Very nice looking and more than enough power for what I needed.

Reviews.Title: for my mom
Reviews.Author: josh anderson
Reviews.Content: bought this for my mom she loves it really sharp looking she is very happy with it so i am to

Reviews.Title: Gater Fan
Reviews.Author: Rose Mills
Reviews.Content: It's superb. The contrast between keys and board are a welcome feature to these old eyes. Every feature is user friendly, though the accompanying literature was comically brief. My only major complaint is fugitive cursor. Now you see it and...oh, well. Great product. Well done, Gateway et al.

Reviews.Title: Good looks, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: This is an attractive, solid product. It's also heavy. Since its size is at the largest end of the laptop spectrum, you'll have to pay a bit more for a carry bag. Excellent display. Fast processor. However, the sound quality is THE PITS. Tinny, barely audible. Makes watching a movie, or even a YouTube video, very painful. Sound is fine when you listen on headphones, so maybe it's the speaker. I plug an external speaker into the headphone jack when watching a movie, and this takes care of the problem. It's a nuisance, though. On the whole, I like this laptop but I wish it had better speakers.

Reviews.Title: Nice but a PIA.
Reviews.Author: James Crosby "???"
Reviews.Content: I like the computer, it's a nice piece of equipment. But the touch pad buttons don't function properly. I have to click them 5-6 times before they work. I'm in a computer for hours at a time and don't have time to wrestle with things that should operate without have to think about it.

Reviews.Title: Some issues
Reviews.Author: mitusi
Reviews.Content: I just got it recently so this is so far. Keyboard is too soft, jumping when you type sometime. Otherwise is seems to be OK.

Reviews.Title: Really nice computer
Reviews.Author: DD "tudorose"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this Gateway laptop. I was so tired of my slow, outdated Toshiba and jumped on this deal which was over $300 less than a brand new model on another site. It has Windows 7 which is hard to find so this was a great value to me. The computer looks brand new although it's refurbished, and I'm keeping my fingers crossed that it will be problem free. It was shipped very quickly and securely which was a plus as well.

Reviews.Title: Gateway NV76R45U 17.3-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Edward F.
Reviews.Content: A windows 7 laptop is getting hard to find. I think Windows 8 is junk and Windows 8.1 is like putting lipstick on a pig. I use this laptop for work and home. It's not my primary computer. It can play games fairly well. Graphic intensive games may not run very well however. The limitations with a laptop's internal video is to be expected unless your spending a couple thousand on a laptop. Otherwise it has everything I need and in a stylish package to boot.It has been about 15 years since I bought a Gateway product. I'm not disappointed in this product and would buy another if the need arose.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: My new gateway laptop rocks it was just what I was looking for I could not find it anywhere else got it fast to.

Reviews.Title: I reccommend this for older adults.
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I chose this computer because it had Windows 7, a large screen, and a white keyboard (I have trouble seeing the letters on a black keyboard)  which eliminated a lot of other computers.  And lots of memory 6GB.  Of course I replaced an old acer with a stupid divided hard drive and only 1GB, so this was a huge upgrade.  Best of all -- it is soooo fast.

Reviews.Title: Not bad but came with defective HDD
Reviews.Author: Lucas Ross
Reviews.Content: It was fine, nothing extremely disappointing about it, but the occasional blue screens and failures to boot due to a faulty HDD caused me to send it back. Obviously quality control could be better.

Reviews.Title: Very nice looking and excellent packing
Reviews.Author: kongpenglin
Reviews.Content: Really good laptop PC in good price.comfortable feel to keyboard.when I open the packing box. I see my nice PC.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-3110M 2.4 GHz
6 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Gateway NV76R45U 17.3-Inch Laptop
